name: Lost Friend (KasperFGang)
description:
Lost Friend

After a long lack of contact with your friend, you decide to check his house until you know what fear and horror awaits you. The person who made the fastest passage of the game will be shown here:  Queenfaith

We hope for your reviews, have a nice game. 
Made by KasperFGang with his best friend Pinpino.

please donate <3
